name: Rainlocked
description:
It began raining all around the Earth years ago. Although people have learned to adapt, we're quickly running out of dry land to inhabit. We have nowhere left to go after all is submerged. The rain shows no signs of stopping any time soon. Our only hope now is building an ark, a spaceship that can harbor a few souls to take us somewhere new. Although it seems like little more than wishful thinking, this common project has renewed our energies to seek a new future for ourselves. However, there is not much time left. The rain is merciless and will not stop. We have barely enough to make this dream a reality, but we'll have to make do...

Build a spaceship at the top of the mountain before the rain engulfs everything. A timed 2D building strategy game.

Download ReadMe for gameplay instructions!

A submission to My First Game Jam: Winter 2021.

Made in collaboration by Darkonia & Luis0n7i.

Credits:

Game art by Zabin (https://opengameart.org/users/zabin )

Building asset pack “Colony Sim Assets” by Buch (https://opengameart.org/content/colony-sim-assets )

Spaceship asset by pitrizzo (https://opengameart.org/content/spaceship-1 )

Background art by greggman (https://opengameart.org/content/backgrounds-for-2d-platformers )

SFX “300+ Futuristic SFX with names (strategy game sound effects)” by GameSupplyGuy (https://gamesupply.itch.io/300-futuristic-sfx-with-names )

Rain loop by aesqe (https://freesound.org/people/aesqe/sounds/37618/ )

Music: Josh Woodward - I’m Letting Go (Instrumental) https://www.joshwoodward.com/song/ImLettingGo
